title: Tinder users looking for romance reveal the harsh messages they've sent
text:
If you've ever tried to search for love online, these sarcastic responses to unwanted advances are sure to strike a chord.

Go Social rounded up a selection of brutal replies sent by Tinder users fed up with cheesy chat-up lines - and X-rated suggestions.

Many of the users from around the world chose to send harsh replies after receiving sexual messages, while others were offered quick-thinking responses to tired clichés.

Another person claimed their thumb had slipped, when asked what attracted them to swipe to communicate.

Go Social rounded up a selection of hilarious responses sent on Tinder, including one woman who threatened to kill when compared to the sun

Another Tinder user suggested taking a man to the vet to get neutered, after he asked her what kind of collar she would prefer

One person claimed their thumb had slipped, when asked what attracted them to the person they swiped on

Another individual said they had lowered their standards, in response to a man who was pleased he had been swiped despite his topless photos

A woman who received a message about getting freaky under the sheets, advised her match to ask his father

One individual who was given the choice to choose what kind of message they would receive, chose to add another option to the list

A man who asked a woman to convince him why he should want to know her, received the reply that he shouldn't
description: Go Social rounded up a selection of brutal replies sent by Tinder users from around the world who are fed up fed up with cheesy chat-up lines - and X-rated suggestions.
